description:
SumatraPDF is a multi-format (PDF, EPUB, MOBI, CBZ, CBR, FB2, CHM, XPS, DjVu) reader for Windows.

SumatraPDF is a free PDF, eBook (ePub, Mobi), Comic Book (CBZ/CBR), DjVu, XPS, CHM, image viewer for Windows.
It's small and starts up fast.
Simplicity of user interface is important to us.
- Fix not showing tab text
- Fix Bookmarks for folder showing bad file names
- Make menus in dark themes look more like standard menus (bigger padding)
- Update translations
